trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class that represents a tracking channel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> classe base que representa um canal de controle.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] If a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> is present, the runtime tracking infrastructure calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> to get a tracking channel for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Se um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>estiver presente, o tempo de execução de chamadas de infraestrutura de rastreamento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A>para obter um canal de controle para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this tracking channel to send tracking records associated with the workflow instance back to the host application whenever the tracking infrastructure matches a track point in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução usa esse canal de controle para enviar registros de controle associado com a instância de fluxo de trabalho para o aplicativo de host sempre que a infraestrutura de rastreamento corresponde a um ponto de controle no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>associado com a instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Your application can treat this tracking information in any way you choose.
trans-unit.target: Seu aplicativo pode tratar essas informações de controle de qualquer forma que você escolher.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> writes tracking information to a SQL database.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>grava informações de rastreamento em um banco de dados do SQL.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: To create a tracking channel for your tracking service, derive a class from the TrackingChannel base class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um canal de controle para o serviço de controle, derive uma classe da classe base TrackingChannel.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters> object passed by the runtime tracking infrastructure in its call to your implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> to associate each instance of your tracking channel with a specific workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters>objeto passado pelo tempo de execução controle infraestrutura na chamada de sua implementação de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A>para associar a uma instância de fluxo de trabalho específico de cada instância do seu canal de controle.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine requests a tracking channel from each tracking service that has provided a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho solicita um canal de controle de cada serviço de acompanhamento que forneceu um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, notifies a receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel has either completed or terminated.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, notifica um receptor de dados no canal de controle que a instância de fluxo de trabalho associada ao canal de controle foi concluída ou terminada.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure calls InstanceCompletedOrTerminated to notify the receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with this tracking channel has either terminated or completed.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução chama InstanceCompletedOrTerminated para notificar o receptor de dados no canal de controle que a instância de fluxo de trabalho associada a esse canal de controle encerrado ou concluído.

trans-unit.source: No more data will be sent on the tracking channel.
trans-unit.target: Não há mais dados serão enviados no canal de controle.

trans-unit.source: When InstanceCompletedOrTerminated is called, you may perform whatever actions are required by your implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando InstanceCompletedOrTerminated é chamado, você pode executar qualquer ação que é necessárias pela sua implementação da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sends a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> on the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, envia um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure calls Send to deliver a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord> on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> when it matches a track point in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução chama Send para entregar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord>na caixa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>quando ele corresponde a um ponto de controle em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can treat the tracking information sent on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> in whatever manner the requirements of your application dictate.
trans-unit.target: Você pode tratar as informações de rastreamento enviadas <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>forma que determinam os requisitos do seu aplicativo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>
